**Title and Reference Information:**

**Evaluation of Rogers Network Resilience**

Reference Number: PW-23-01026859
Solicitation Number: CRTC 23-0049
Amendment Number: 7

**Publication and Tender Information:**

* Publication Date: 2023-02-23
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-04 at 14:00:00 (Expired)
* Amendment Date: 2023-03-22

**Procurement Category and Notice Type:**

* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Trade Agreements and Regions:**

* Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and others (see attachment)
* Regions of Opportunity: Unspecified
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR), Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Canadian Radio Television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC)
* Contact: Adriana Malikah Martel
* Email: [Approvisionnements-Procurements@crtc.gc.ca](mailto:Approvisionnements-Procurements@crtc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 873-353-7195

**RFP Description:**

The Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) is seeking a consultancy firm to evaluate Rogers' wireless and wireline telecommunications networks for resilience in all aspects related to the July 8, 2022 network outage. The firm will assess Rogers' proposed changes to prevent future outages and provide recommendations for network resilience improvement.

The evaluation will focus on:

* Analyzing and assessing Rogers' wireless and wireline telecommunications networks
* Evaluating Rogers' proposed changes to prevent future network outages
* Providing recommendations for network resilience improvement

The contract duration is expected to be four months.

**Attachments:**

Please refer to the attached documents for additional information, including:

* Questions and Answers (PDF)
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents (PDF and Word)
* Amendments to the RFP (PDF)
* Rogers' proposed changes to prevent future network outages (PDF)
